programme.title: Race to Mars
programme.desc: The crew is suffering from carbon monoxide poisoning due to a major system flaw. Rick and Antoine exit the craft to repair and replace the faulty electrical boards.

programme.title: Mutant
programme.desc: When two brothers go on vacation in a small southern town, they discover that most of its residents have been infected and have turned into toxic vampires prowling the streets for human blood.

programme.title: Berserker: Hell's Warrior
programme.desc: When a Viking warlord defies his god, Odin curses the warlord's son to die and be reborn as a Berserker. Pursued by the cult of the Berserkers, his is the perpetual battle between good and evil.

programme.title: Mike Hammer, Private Eye
programme.desc: An Internet lingerie model goes missing, and a cyber snuff film turns deadly serious. The actress is believed to be dead, and Mike Hammer is determined to bring the murderer to real-world justice.

programme.title: Mr. Lucky
programme.desc: Mr. Lucky and Andamo take charge of the contender for a charity boxing match, but are warned by the opponent's manager he must take the fall or else there will be grave consequences.

programme.title: Harts of the West
programme.desc: In order to gain good favor with his parole people, Marcus has volunteered to mentor Evan, a boombox-wielding troubled teenager, as part of his own community service.

programme.title: Peter Gunn
programme.desc: Gunn is hired by a wealthy businessman to deter his son from trying to solve the case of an Investment Counselor. He disappeared with a suitcase of money and murdered a cop.

programme.title: Tropical Heat
programme.desc: Nick is hired to find a woman who got hold of a new and deadly drug. As his search progresses, Nick begins to wonder if he was actually hired to find the drug itself.

programme.title: Spike Team
programme.desc: Spike Team comes to Vito's aid after a terrible disaster. Back at the college, Grace is worried about the fate of the school. Luther and his partner continue their plan to help the girls.

programme.title: The Adventures of Robin Hood
programme.desc: The Sheriff plans to extort money from local merchants by having some of his men disguise themselves as Robin's band and stage robberies. Robin sends Tuck to discover the Sheriff's plans.

programme.title: The Buccaneers
programme.desc: Taffy backs out of marriage with one of the colony girls. In retaliation, the girls threaten to leave. Tempest tries to broker a new proposal before the women follow through with their threat.

programme.title: Weirdsister College
programme.desc: Mildred Hubble has been accepted to Weirdsister College, and in typical Milly fashion, she arrives late on her first day. Even worse, she'll be sharing a room with rival Ethel Hallow.

programme.title: The Lost World
programme.desc: With all of Lost World thirsting for water, the explorers are attacked by raptors. They are aided by a young woman, Ana, and Marguerite becomes interested in her knowledge of the Fountain of Youth.

programme.title: Matt and Jenny
programme.desc: A young woman arrives in town seeking a guide to take her to the treacherous Devil's Gorge. She ventures into the wilderness to find her husband, who disappeared there months earlier.

programme.title: BFF
programme.desc: Jill tells her best friend Jack that she's beginning to speculate her boyfriend might be cheating on her. Jack offers to trail him for her, but it's not in the way Jill thinks.

programme.title: Kill or Be Killed
programme.desc: Two former ranking figures of the Axis powers schedule a deadly martial arts tournament in an isolated locale. The two rivals then race to assemble the top competitors from around the world.

programme.title: Kill and Kill Again
programme.desc: When Dr. Horatio Kane is kidnapped and forced to create an army of martial artists that can take over the world, his daughter Kandy Kane is the only one who can help.

programme.title: Dirty Laundry
programme.desc: A young man and his girlfriend unwittingly come into possession of a bag containing a million dollars belonging to a drug smuggling ring. The mobsters try to catch the couple and retrieve the money.

programme.title: Hoodlum and Son
programme.desc: In 1933, ten-year-old Archie is placed in the care of his hoodlum father. When Archie accompanies him on a deal, plans go awry. Now, father and son need to outrun rival gangster Ugly Jim McCrae.

programme.title: Nitti: The Enforcer
programme.desc: After Al Capone was sent to prison for tax evasion, Francesco Nitti took the Chicago Outfit to new heights, gaining control over labor unions. Based on a true story.

programme.title: The Return of Eliot Ness
programme.desc: Detective Eliot Ness helps avenge his former partner's murder by investigating the case that he was working on when he was killed, which involves one of Al Capone's associates.

programme.title: Martial Outlaw
programme.desc: DEA agent Kevin White has followed a drug-dealing ex-KGB kingpin from Moscow to Los Angeles. There, Kevin crosses paths with his brother Jack, an LAPD cop who wants in on the action--from both sides.
